description:
Stuck in an apartment without air conditioning in record breaking heat, Takafumi`s uncle negotiates with the Ice Spirits for help.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Koori no Seirei ga Cooler Mahou no Taika o Youkyuu Shiterunda yo
The Ice Spirit Demands a Price for Its Cooler Magic
氷の精霊がクーラー魔法の対価を要求してるんだよ
